messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The Doors
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 03/04/2003 16:17:45 Pacific Standard Time, ... Haven t seen it, what is it  called? I can t say he can act really well, but as Jim Morrison
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 03/04/2003 16:17:45 Pacific Standard Time,
nellebelle@... writes:


> Did you ever see the movie with Val Kilmer where he is a genius living in a
> secret chamber on a college campus? He enters his chamber through the
> closet of a dorm room.
>

Haven't seen it, what is it called? I can't say he can act really well, but
as Jim Morrison he was pretty alright.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The Doors
messages.msgSnippet: Oh, it s been a while.  Guess I better watch it again.  Thanks for telling me the title! Mary Ellen
messages.messageBody:
Oh, it's been a while. Guess I better watch it again. Thanks for telling
me the title!
Mary Ellen

----- snip----- > Are you thinking of Real Genius?

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The Doors
messages.msgSnippet: ... Are you thinking of Real Genius?  If so, he wasn t he one living in the secret chamber, but it was his dorm room the guy came through.  One of my all time
messages.messageBody:
>Did you ever see the movie with Val Kilmer where he is a genius living in a
>secret chamber on a college campus? He enters his chamber through the
>closet of a dorm room.
>Mary Ellen


Are you thinking of Real Genius? If so, he wasn't he one living in the
secret chamber, but it was his dorm room the guy came through. One of my
all time favorite movies. It's the one with the girl, Jordan, who talks
really fast and never sleeps. And LOTS of popcorn at the end.

My seven year old just saw it. I'm quite proud to say he enjoyed it. -evil
grin-

Kelly

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The Doors
messages.msgSnippet: I liked it!  I loved it! Did you ever see the movie with Val Kilmer where he is a genius living in a secret chamber on a college campus?  He enters his chamber
messages.messageBody:
I liked it! I loved it!

Did you ever see the movie with Val Kilmer where he is a genius living in a
secret chamber on a college campus? He enters his chamber through the
closet of a dorm room.

Mary Ellen

----- snip----- > I have to admit to drooling after Val Kilmer in a big way
while watching the
> movie that no one else liked.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The Doors
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 03/04/2003 07:02:05 Pacific Standard Time, curtkar@cox.net ... That sounds absolutely incredible, as I am a Cult fan big time!! I have to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 03/04/2003 07:02:05 Pacific Standard Time, curtkar@...
writes:


> and Ian Asbury of The Cult fills in for Jim Morrison

That sounds absolutely incredible, as I am a Cult fan big time!!
I have to admit to drooling after Val Kilmer in a big way while watching the
movie that no one else liked. How does this tie into unschooling, there must
be a way. I am just happy to be chatting with people.I must get out more.
Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] The Doors
messages.msgSnippet: ... If anyone has a chance to see The Doors - 21st Century concert touring right now (and you are a Doors fan), definitely go and see it! We went last week
messages.messageBody:
> This subject line had me listening to The Doors all day.
>
> Come on baby light my fire...
>
> Deb L


If anyone has a chance to see "The Doors - 21st Century" concert touring
right now (and you are a Doors fan), definitely go and see it!

We went last week and Ian Asbury of The Cult fills in for Jim Morrison. He
did an awesome job - very much sounds and looks like Jim (from footage I've
seen, of course ;-). The keyboardist and guitarist are from the original
Doors.
Great concert - good show.

Karin
